examples.comment_3: Clear image watermarks by search criteris

content.title: **[{{ProdShortName}}]({{ProductUrl}})** streamlines the process of removing watermarks from business documents. Elevate your {{EnvName}} application by seamlessly integrating our library and following these straightforward steps:
content.step_1: Initiate the process by instantiating the core class, **Watermarker**, with the {{FileformatCap}} document. Our versatile API seamlessly processes documents, whether provided as a stream or a local path.
content.step_2: Leverage **SearchCriteria** to precisely pinpoint the watermarks to be addressed. Utilize various parameters such as images, text, or formatting features to refine your search. The more detailed your criteria, the more accurate your results.
content.step_3: Execute the removal process on the list of document watermarks retrieved through your search. Effortlessly delete them from the document.
content.step_4: Upon successfully deleting the watermarks, securely save the resulting document as a local file or a byte stream, preserving its integrity.

more_features.title: {{EnvName}} API for Seamless Watermark Removal | {{ProdShortName}}
more_features.description: Integrate our {{EnvName}} API to effortlessly remove watermarks from documents, enhancing document clarity and aesthetics. Tailored for {{EnvName}} environments, this API is perfect for applications needing to process and present clean documents free of watermarks.

feature_1.title: Streamlined Watermark Removal for {{EnvName}}
feature_1.content: Our API offers streamlined watermark removal tools designed specifically for {{EnvName}} applications, enabling developers to enhance document readability and professional appearance without complex coding.

feature_2.title: {{EnvName}} Batch Watermark Cleanup
feature_2.content: Capitalize on the ability to clear watermarks from multiple documents in one go with our batch processing feature. This is especially useful for applications that need to handle large document flows quickly and efficiently.

feature_3.title: Flexible Watermark Editing via {{EnvName}}
feature_3.content: Adjust, modify, or completely remove watermarks using our flexible editing tools. This feature allows {{EnvName}} developers to tailor document processing to specific business needs or client requests, ensuring optimal outcomes.

code_1.title: Delete spreadsheet header watermarks
code_1.content: This example shows how to delete watermarks which were put into XLSX headers

about.title: {{ProdFullName}}
about.content: {{ProdFullName}} provides a seamless solution for deleting watermarks from your documents using the .NET environment. Developers can effortlessly integrate this functionality to remove unnecessary or outdated watermarks from various file formats, including PDF, Word, Excel, and more. Enhance your document management process with efficient watermark deletion using {{ProdShortName}}.
